body.name: LIQUID GLASS Screen Protector for All Smartphones Tablets and Watches Scratch and Shatter Resistant Wipe On Nano Protection for Up To 4 Devices - Bottle
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 6 mins
features: Liquid Glass is an advanced technology, invisible, wipe-on screen protector that bonds to the glass of your device offering enhanced scratch, moisture, and impact resistance.

Made of silica dioxide (Si02) which is essentially microscopic particles of glass suspended in a liquid solution. Fills in the imperfections of the screen and adds an additional layer of glass (should not be used to repair broken screens. Does not fix existing scratches or damages).
Adds an additional extremely thin layer of glass that is highly scratch & shatter resistant and increases the glass' strength to 9 H hardness level. (Does Not fix or repair existing damages)
Easy, bubble free, wipe-on application with a universal fit; ideal for curved screens and tablets.
Universal: Compatible with all mobile devices, phones, tablets and smart watches, cameras, touch screens. 100% Compatible with fingerprint readers or sensors.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: YOU ARE COVERED Luvvitt's LIQUID GLASS universal screen protector is compatible with all mobile devices including phones, tablets, smart watches and other gadgets with glass screens. Screen protection is INCLUDED with 250, 500 and 750 USD coverage levels based on your choice. Or you can select the No Coverage option (white packaging) that still offers the same cutting-edge protection without the coverage. Choose what fits your needs for a peace of mind.

WHAT IS LIQUIDGLASS? HOW DOES IT WORK? In Simple Terms: The glass that we use in our every day life, is mainly made of silicon dioxide (SiO2). Luvvitt's LIQUID GLASS is also mainly made of SiO2 that is in liquid form. It covers the screen with an additional layer of glass similar to a tempered glass. The difference: Luvvitt LIQUID GLASS is not a tempered glass or a film. It is a cutting-edge, super durable, completely transparent liquid wipe-on screen protector that bonds to the glass of your device offering greatly enhanced scratch, moisture, and impact resistance. The German formula creates an invisible protective coating that increases the devices screen to 9H hardness. More in-depth: At microscopic level, a glass is not as smooth as it seems. It's imperfect with gaps and pores. This porous surface creates points of weakness when exposed to sharp objects or impacts. Luvvitt LIQUID GLASS fills in the microscopic pores and coats the surface with an additional layer, resulting in stronger and more scratch resistant surface.

APPLICATION CLEAN Clean all glass surfaces thoroughly with the cleaning wipe supplied in Sachet 1. Remove all traces of the cleaner and any lint by thoroughly buffing the glass with the microfiber cloth supplied. APPLY Apply LIQUID GLASS screen protector: Open the vial's cap and drip a few drops. Use the dry wipe supplied to apply. DRY Allow the glass surface to cure for at least 10 minutes. The longer you let it cure without touching the better. For this reason, it's recommended to apply it at night. The screen can be touched after 10 minutes however, glass surface will continue curing for the next 24 hours. BUFF Use the microfiber towel supplied in a circular motion to buff out and remove any excess residue from the glass surface.

WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE? (WHY YOU SHOULD CHOOSE LIQUID GLASS) Unlike traditional liquid screen protectors, LIQUID GLASS does NOT need to be re-applied every 1-3 months. The unique formula lasts up to two years while it's recommended to re-apply once per year.LIQUID GLASS screen protector wipe can cover up to 4 devices.LIQUID GLASS does not affect or interfere with fingerprint sensors.Premium grade only. NOT old technology that were designed to be used for ceramic coatings and windshield coatings, LIQUID GLASS is specifically formulated for mobile device screens and produced with cutting-edge technology.LIQUID GLASS is UNIVERSAL and compatible with all mobile devices, phones, smart watches and tablets.LIQUID GLASS is a USA, New York and California based brand offering premium products since a decade. DOES IT INTERFERE WITH FINGERPRINT READERS? Not at all. LIQUID GLASS is 100% compatible fingerprint readers/sensors. CAN A TEMPERED GLASS BE USED ON TOP OF LIQUID GLASS? Yes. Once LIQUID GLASS is applied, dried and buffed it's tempered glass can be applied on top. CAN LIQUID GLASS CAUSE ANY DAMAGE TO MY DEVICE? No. It has been tested vigorously and proven not to cause any damages to the device. HOW OFTEN DO I NEED TO APPLY LIQUID GLASS? It may last up to two years but it's recommended to re-apply once a year. HOW I APPLY ADDITIONAL LAYERS OF LIQUID GLASS? Yes, multiple layers can be applied as desired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought this product for a gift and they absolutely loved it so I purchased one for myself. Not only does it protect your screen like it says but it is very easy to apply as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3rd phone now i'm using it on. works great
reviews.reviewText: No cracked screens yet. I'm not dropping it on concrete every day but i've done it at least once or twice and i'm still good. don't know how, it feels like nothing is on the screen but it works like a charm. 10 out of 10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for ipads
reviews.reviewText: Works great. This is the second time i've bought this product. works great to protect screens. Even my 3 and 6 year old have yet to break this screen protector.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When ever I buy a new phone I always use this liquid glass to protect my phone lense. I can also use my finger sign in on my phone no problems. Works great. rwp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was so easy to install. Which is what I was looking for. It looks great, no air bubbles or cracks.

reviews.reviewText: Its Great Nothing Messes with my phone.

What a joke, Money wasted. Now, if I want to keep my glas from breaking, I will have to spend more money to get a real protector.Don't waste you time putting faith in this so called screen protector.
